DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to investigate the effects of different methods of administration on emergence period after laryngeal mask anesthesia in elderly patients undergoing transurethral endoscopic operation
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Two Induction Means on Emergence After General Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: ASA level I or II, Aged from 65 to 79, With a duration of anesthesia <90 min. Chronic obstructive pulmonary diseases (COPD), Severe heart disease, Difficult airway Liver and kidney dysfunction, Cerebrovascular disease, Bleeding volume >20 ml.
